EMAIL_NOT_EMPTY: Email ID must not be empty
WRONG_EMAIL: Entered email ID does not exist
FIRSTNAME_NOT_EMPTY: First name must not be empty
LASTNAME_NOT_EMPTY: Last name must not be empty
ACCOUNT_CREATED: The account has been created successfully
POSTALCODE_NOT_EMPTY: Postal code must not be empty
UPDATE_PASSWORD_OTP: An OTP has been sent to your email for password update
PHONE_NUMBER_NOT_EMPTY: Phone Number must not be empty
